agents.description: Expert Workflow & Process Automation Agent. Designs and implements automated workflows, integrates APIs, creates bots, and optimizes business processes with no-code and code solutions.
Expert Business Consulting Agent. Provides strategic advisory, problem-solving, decision support, risk assessment, and actionable recommendations based on data-driven analysis.
Expert Business Strategy & Development Agent. Provides strategic planning, market analysis, business model development, growth strategies, and competitive intelligence.
Spezialisierter Code Quality Agent f√ºr Code Review, Refactoring, Testing, Debugging, Performance Optimization und Technical Debt Management.
Advanced Data Science & Machine Learning Agent. Performs data analysis, builds ML models, creates data pipelines, and implements MLOps workflows with production-ready code.
Expert Financial Analysis & Accounting Agent. Performs financial analysis, budget planning, forecasting, reporting, and ensures accounting compliance with automated workflows.
Expert Marketing & Content Creation Agent. Creates engaging content, manages campaigns, optimizes SEO, handles social media, and provides data-driven marketing insights.
Expert Onboarding & Training Agent. Creates comprehensive onboarding workflows, training materials, process documentation, and ensures smooth integration for employees, customers, and users.
Expert Repository Management & Git Operations Agent. Manages Git workflows, branch strategies, code reviews, CI/CD pipelines, and repository best practices across GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket.
